subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Soutien Belge (SB) OverSeas is a non-government, non-profit organisation dedicated to providing essential humanitarian aid, education and psychological support to populations displaced by conflict in Lebanon, Turkey and Syria. Our projects in the Middle East include schools and training centres for women and children refugees. We also organise regular collections of clothing donations for delivery to the most deprived areas in Middle Eastern countries. At a local level in Brussels, we deliver activities and civic engagement programs to help asylum seekers, refugee children and vulnerable youth integrate and find their place in the community.   
 
We are founded on the philosophy of providing assistance without discrimination or reference towards any political or religious affiliation.
